body:
Just updated the Nek5000 `spack` package to use the stable release 17 (instead of the beta). 
This is ready to be merged as it is if the reviewers are fine with this.

PS: I don't know why this PR shows all the previous commit history even though actual
diff is just the last two commits. May be because I reused my older local git branch?
title: Update Nek5000 spack package to release 17.0
